name: Thinreports for PHP
tagline: Easy and Simple way for generating a PDF report on pure PHP
body:
## About

Thinreports for PHP is an implementation of the [Thinreports Generator](https://github.com/thinreports/thinreports-generator) in PHP. It provides easy and simple way for generating a PDF report on pure PHP.

## Getting Started

  * [Code, Details and Quick Reference](https://github.com/thinreports-php/thinreports-php/#thinreports-generator-for-php)
  * [Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/thinreports-php/thinreports-php)

### What is Thinreports

[Thinreports](http://www.thinreports.org) is an open source report generation tools. It provides the Thinreports Editor which is a tool for designing a report format, and the Thinreports Generator for Ruby which is a library for generating a PDF. See the following pages for further details.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
